definitions.title: adv.
definitions.body: now (so Eg. Aram. (CIS:ii. 137 = cooke:No.73 RÉS:361 B S-C:Pap. C 5); Targum, e.g. Nu 22:4: [[עַן]] prob. a subst. fr. [[[עָנׇה]]] the √ of [[עֵת]] (p. 773:a), time; so [[כְּעַן]] lit. at (this) time = Heb. [[עַתָּה]]: K:§ 67, 4);—Da 2:23 [[וּכְעַן הוֹדַעְתַּנִי]], Da 3:15, Da 4:34, Da 5:12, Da 5:15, Da 5:16, Da 6:9, Ezr 4:13, Ezr 4:14, Ezr 4:21, Ezr 5:17, Ezr 6:6; [[עַד־כְּעַן]] until now Ezr 5:16 (so Targum Ge 18:22 +).
